chapter.text: 87|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukatamkeung neam nei mcheasa robsa  anak da utdongk utdam choh .
87|2|trong chea anak del ban bangkeut( avei  teangoasa)  ruoch trong ban  riebcham aoy mean lokkhan samoromy .
87|3|ning chea anak del ban kamnt veasanea  ning phdal kar changaoulobangheanh .
87|4|ning chea anak del bandoh roukkhcheate baitng krobbebyeang .
87|5|kraoyomk trong ban thveu aoy vea klaycha chambaeng snguot pnrkhmaw .
87|6|yeung nung sautr( kompir kuor an) aoy anak( mou ham meat)sdab  haey anak nung min phe  l ch vea laey .
87|7|leuklengte avei del a l laoh mean chetnea( aoy anak phe  l ch)  bonnaoh .  pitabrakd nasa  trong doeng nouv avei del leatatradeang ning  leakkambang .
87|8|haey yeung nung samruol aoy anak nouv meakra da ngeayosruol(krob  kechchakar) .
87|9|dau che  neah  chaur anak kraenromluk choh  brasenbae kar kraenromluk noh  mean phalobrayoch
87|10|anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh  nung ttuol yk kar kraen  romluk .
87|11|bo nde anak del min kaotakhlach a l laoh nung kech chenhpi vea
87|12|kuchea anak del nung trauv chaul tow knong pheu  l ng nork yeang thomtheng .
87|13|banteabmk ke min ach slab  haeyka min ach rsa daoy  ngeayosruol der nowknong nork noh .
87|14|anak del saamatakhluon( pi brakear shi ri k)  pitchea ttuol ban  chokchy .
87|15|ning anak del ban romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa ke haeyning  brate b tde sa la t .
87|16|phtoytowvinh  puok anak bercha sraleanh karorsanow knong  lokey towvinh
87|17|thveitbette thngai barlok vea brasaer cheang ning amt kadaoy .
87|18|pitabrakd nasa  rueng nih ku mean cheng nowknong kompir moun  .
87|19|dauchchea kompir robsa ai pr hi m  ning mou sa cheadaem .
